code: @Test public void testPayloadIsTransformed() throws InterruptedException {     MockEndpoint mockOut = getMockEndpoint("mock:out").     mockOut.setExpectedMessageCount(1).     mockOut.message(0).body().isEqualTo("Modified: Cheese").     template.sendBody("direct:in", "Cheese").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Test public void testPayloadIsTransformedAgain() throws InterruptedException {     MockEndpoint mockOut = getMockEndpoint("mock:out").     mockOut.setExpectedMessageCount(1).     mockOut.message(0).body().isEqualTo("Modified: Foo").     template.sendBody("direct:in", "Foo").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }
